title: interlude - Peter Parker
body:
part eleven - Sweetener Series

Song: R.E.M - Ariana Grande

Prompt: “You’re such a dream to me.”

Dreamland: you haven’t seen Peter in weeks until you dream about him.

Warnings: fluff, little smutty

Even though you and Peter were doing better you hadn’t actually seen him in weeks. This is what happens when you want to confront feelings and avoid them all at the same time. He was a crime fighting spider and you were a teenager trying to get through the rest of high school.

You had stayed up late the night before getting ready for tests you had the next day. Except now that you were actually at school you didn’t think that was such a good idea. As you slouched your way to first period you didn’t care if you just sat in the back to catch up on some z’s. The first test of your day didn’t start until third period, you had time.

Dozing off a specific curly haired boy entered your mind.

“You ready to go?” Peter asked licking his lips.

“Of course,” you took his hand walking out the door.

Peter escorted you to the school dance. He looked like a fine specimen in his suit and tie. You couldn’t take your eyes off of him as his warm hands led you through the gym doors to the cheesy dance theme. Everyone had there eyes on you, you and Peter were the cutest couple. He kept insisting it was because you were the most exquisite girl there but you knew the truth.

“No Peter,” you giggled with a rose blush on your cheeks, “I swear it’s because we are the cutest couple!”

“But you are so beautiful!” he spun you around. Showing you off to everyone possible.

Giggling as he twirled you around you started to feel dizzy. “OMG. Stop,” you laughed and Peter spun you one last time into his arms.

“You okay love?” he longingly looked you in the eye.

“Yeah,” you smiled up at him, “just a little dizzy from all your twirling.”

“Does she know she talks in her sleep?” Betty whispered.

“Stop Peter, I’m dizzy,” you mumbled under your breath.

“I don’t think so,” Gwen stated eyebrows furrowed in confusion. “I thought they broke up?”

“They did,” Betty continued to whisper as she looked back at you.

“Peter,” you snuggled into your arms.

“Maybe she still ha fe-” you didn’t hear the rest of the sentence for you fell back to sleep.

Dancing together you took in his features and how the different colors from the lights radiated off his skin. Handsome wasn’t the word you would use to describe Peter. He was magical, almost like he shouldn’t exist. Strong and safe was how you felt everytime you were in his arms. Nothing could break you, nothing at all. That’s how you wanted it to be at least.

Suddenly swift Peter took you away from the dance floor someplace romantic. Giggling down the hallway wondering where on Earth he was taking you; Peter soon stopped at the doorway to the roof.

“Oh Peter,” you gasped.

“What?” he let out a soft chuckle, “You don’t want to dance under real stars?”

“That’s not it,” you smiled at him cheeks slightly hot, “I would go anywhere with you Peter Parker.” You reached on your tip toes to kiss him on the cheek.

Touching his warm cheek Peter looked down at you with a crooked smile. Jolting up the stairs with you he stopped just as quickly as he started. Reaching the roof you looked in aw at how bright the stars shown through the pollution.

“What did you do Parker?” you asked letting go of his hand.

“I may have……” he trailed off, “made my own stars.”

“You did what?” you turned around shocked. But not surprised, he was a genius after all.

“I, uh, made stars for you?” he questioned as if what he did was wrong.

“Peter,” you ran to him, “that’s amazing and wonderful and….” you kissed him because that was the only thing that seemed right. Tugging at his curls he leaned into the physically shocking kiss. With passion he pulled you closer into his arms leaving no room for escape. As soon as you were about to make things more interesting you heard your name being called.

“(Y/N), (Y/N) are you up there?” you thought it was your father’s voice but that was impossible. He was at home, right? “(Y/N), (Y/N), (Y/N)………” it faded out slowly as you opened your eyes.

Seeing Betty and Gwen shaking you awake trying to get you up for next period, “(Y/N) it’s time for our next class,” Betty said as Gwen continued to shake you to make sure you stayed awake.

“Okay, okay,” you said groggily gathering your things and leaving the classroom with your friends.

“So,” Gwen said making a look towards Betty.

“Did you have a good dream?” Gwen continued.

“I guess so, why?” you raised an eyebrow at them.

“It’s just that,” Betty was totally nervous, “you kinda…..” she trailed off.

“You talk in your sleep,” Gwen finished.

“Oh I do,” you hid your blushing cheeks behind your books.

“Just a little bit,” Gwen squinted as she made an example of how little with her fingers.

“I’m just so tired from studying for these tests.”

“We all are,” Betty put a hand on your shoulder in comfort, “but we don’t dream about our ex’s.” she finished abruptly.

“BETTY!” Gwen sounded shocked, “That’s a terrible thing to say.”

“No,” you squeaked, “It’s alright. I’m just as confused as you are.” stopping in the middle of the hall with their attention. “I knew I still had feelings for Peter when I broke up with him, but I didn’t think I would be having any dreams about him. I guess that’s what happens when my heart doesn’t feel like it’s over.”

“Then why did you break up with Peter?” Betty asked curiously.

“I just needed time to myself to work out some personal things. Peter agreed, so we went our different ways.” you almost started to cry thinking about everything that happened all those weeks ago.

“But there is no chance you will get back together?” Betty asked another question out of curiosity.

“I don’t know? Only time will be able to tell that,” you gave a small smile and walked away to your next class hoping to continue your dream.

Sitting in the back of the class again you put your head down on the desk preparing for all the trouble.

“What was that about?” Peter asked when you got back on the roof of the school.

“Oh it was nothing,” you brushed off his question, “Where were we?” you stepped closer to him.

“I believe, we were stargazing,” Peter took your hand in his continuing the romantic ritual.

“I don’t know,” you looked down at your feet, “I’m pretty sure we were doing something else.”

“Oh, you mean this,” he took hold of your body in a tight hug. Leaning his head down to reach your lips. You moved your hands to his hair ready to tug at his perfect curls. Eventually Peter laid a wet needy kiss on your lips. It was like he missed you too. But how could he know what you were dreaming about?

“Does she know she drools?” some asshole said.

“Everyone drools dumbass,” MJ hit him over the head.

Peter moved his lips down your neck leaving little love bites along the way. As things heated up between the two of you; you wanted nothing more than to get deeper under his skin. In no hurry you took off his jacket making the moment last as long as possible.

Going for his tie Peter stopped you, “Not the tie.” he left your skin, “worked to hard to properly put this thing on.” he blushed at the touch of your hands.

“Alright,” you gave his nose a peck.

Unbuttoning his shirt your hands start to shake. What were you doing? You were totally not ready for this!

“I-I’m sorry Peter,” you blushed buttoning his shirt back up. “I’m just not ready.”

“You don’t have to be sorry. I understand,” he held your shaking hands to his heart, “besides I wouldn’t want my first time to be outside in the cold.” he gave you a little wink.

“You’re such a dream to me,” you brought him down to you kissing him once more.

Abruptly waking up, you wiped the drool from your mouth making a few heads turn. But all you could think was ‘shit.’

——————————————————————————————-

I’m just as confused as you are.” stopping in the middle of the hall with their attention. “I knew I still had feelings for Peter when I broke up with him, but I didn’t think I would be having any dreams about him. I guess that’s what happens when my heart doesn’t feel like it’s over.”

“Then why did you break up with Peter?” Betty asked curiously.

“I just needed time to myself to work out some personal things. Peter agreed, so we went our different ways.” you almost started to cry thinking about everything that happened all those weeks ago.

“But there is no chance you will get back together?” Betty asked another question out of curiosity.

“I don’t know? Only time will be able to tell that,” you gave a small smile and walked away to your next class hoping to continue your dream.

Sitting in the back of the class again you put your head down on the desk preparing for all the trouble.

“What was that about?” Peter asked when you got back on the roof of the school.

“Oh it was nothing,” you brushed off his question, “Where were we?” you stepped closer to him.

“I believe, we were stargazing,” Peter took your hand in his continuing the romantic ritual.

“I don’t know,” you looked down at your feet, “I’m pretty sure we were doing something else.”

“Oh, you mean this,” he took hold of your body in a tight hug. Leaning his head down to reach your lips. You moved your hands to his hair ready to tug at his perfect curls. Eventually Peter laid a wet needy kiss on your lips. It was like he missed you too. But how could he know what you were dreaming about?

“Does she know she drools?” some asshole said.

“Everyone drools dumbass,” MJ hit him over the head.

Peter moved his lips down your neck leaving little love bites along the way. As things heated up between the two of you; you wanted nothing more than to get deeper under his skin. In no hurry you took off his jacket making the moment last as long as possible.

Going for his tie Peter stopped you, “Not the tie.” he left your skin, “worked to hard to properly put this thing on.” he blushed at the touch of your hands.

“Alright,” you gave his nose a peck.

Unbuttoning his shirt your hands start to shake. What were you doing? You were totally not ready for this!

“I-I’m sorry Peter,” you blushed buttoning his shirt back up. “I’m just not ready.”

“You don’t have to be sorry. I understand,” he held your shaking hands to his heart, “besides I wouldn’t want my first time to be outside in the cold.” he gave you a little wink.

“You’re such a dream to me,” you brought him down to you kissing him once more.

Abruptly waking up, you wiped the drool from your mouth making a few heads turn. But all you could think was ‘shit.’

——————————————————————————————-

trail.content_abstract:
part eleven - Sweetener Series

Song: R.E.M - Ariana Grande

Prompt: “You’re such a dream to me.”

Dreamland: you haven’t seen Peter in weeks until you dream about him.

Warnings: fluff, little smutty

Even though you and Peter were doing better you hadn’t actually seen him in weeks. This is what happens when you want to confront feelings and avoid them all at the same time. He was a crime fighting spider and you were a teenager trying to get through the rest of high school.

You had stayed up late the night before getting ready for tests you had the next day. Except now that you were actually at school you didn’t think that was such a good idea. As you slouched your way to first period you didn’t care if you just sat in the back to catch up on some z’s. The first test of your day didn’t start until third period, you had time.

Dozing off a specific curly haired boy entered your mind.

summary: Cross My Heart And Hope To Die
title: Cross My Heart And Hope To Die
body:
Peter Parker x Reader

Warnings: Crappy Writing

Request: Hey I was wondering if you would write a peter Parker x fem reader where his s/o has crazy healing abilities that hurts the person getting healed and takes a physical toll on the user So let’s say peter comes home with a bad concussion and his s/o has to heal him even if it means she’ll be bedridden for days

A/N: Sorry if the fic wasn’t what you wanted, I was a bit confused about what you wanted. I know, I should have said something but whenever I need to ask something to someone, I get really nervous. So, I just wrote what I thought. Sorry again.

Ever since you could remember, you’ve had these astonishing healing powers.

When you first got them, you weren’t really surprise because your entire family has superpowers.

Some of your family members even went to Xavier’s School for Gifted Youngsters. Though, you chose to stay in Queens.

You were now 16 years old and going to Midtown High.

School just ended and you were at your locker putting away the books you didn’t need when all of a sudden, a pair of arms wrap around your waist.

Automatically you knew it was your boyfriend, Peter.

“Hey Petey.”

“Hello my love.” He said while burying his face into your neck.

“You sound tired, did you get enough sleep?”

“Hmm no.”

“Oh Peter, that’s terrible. Sleep is very important especially if you want to function through the day.”

“I know but I had… things to do.”

“Like?”

“Uhh… homework and uhh… studying.”

You weren’t buying his excuse but you didn’t want to push it. He will tell when he’s ready.

You only nodded and closed your locker.

You turned around and he lifted his head.

“Please try to get more sleep this time.”

“I don’t kno…”

Before he could finish, you interrupted by saying, “Please Pete.”

He sighed and said, “I’ll try.”

You smiled and said, “Good… you know I’m just trying to look out for you. I love you and I don’t want you to ruin your health.”

“I know and thank you for that, I love you too.”

You grab his face and gave him a chaste kiss.

*hours later*

It was 10 at night and you were sitting at your desk finishing your homework when you hear a tapping at your window.

You look over and was shocked to see Spider-Man.

He signaled for you to let him in.

You got up and opened your window so he can come him.

As he was coming in, you were internally freaking out because you’re a huge fan.

After he was in, you closed the window.

You turn to look at him and said, “So Spider-Man, what brings you here?”

“Huh uhh…” then he looks around, “oh wait this isn’t Ned’s place.”

“Ned as in Ned Leeds?”

“Yeah, he helps me with my wounds.”

“So, Ned knows who you are?”

“Yeah, he’s my best friend, and he accidentally saw me in my suit without the mask.”

“But…” Then you gasped, “Peter?!” You whisper yell.

“Obviously…” Then he looks down, “oh wait I’m still in my suit.”

“We’ll talk about the Spider-Man thing later but are you okay?”

“I don’t think so, I feel dizzy and nauseous.”

You grabbed his hand and led him to your bed.

“You should sit.” You said and he did as he was told.

You grabbed your laptop, sat down next to Peter, and looked up what he could have.

A few minutes later, you find out that Peter could possibly have a concussion.

You closed your laptop, look over at Peter and asked, “Peter, turn your body towards me.”

He did has he was told and crossed his legs.

“I’m not sure if this will hurt because I never done this to another person but I really hope it doesn’t. If it does though, please forgive me.”

You brought your hands up to either side of his head and closed your eyes but before anything could happen, you felt Peter’s hand caressing your cheek.

You open your eyes and Peter said, “You are absolutely stunning, do you have a boyfriend?”

You smiled and said, “Yes I do.”

He removed his hand from your cheek, bowed his head and said, “Oh.”

You giggled and said, “You’re my boyfriend Pete.”

He lifted his head and said, “Really? Damn I’m lucky!”

You giggled again and said, “I’m more the lucky one but right now, I have to concentrate.”

He nodded and whispered to himself, “No, I’m the lucky one.”

You heard him and smiled.

Then, you closed your eyes and concentrated.

A few seconds later, you hear Peter grunting in pain.

You were about to take your hands away and stop but he instantly held your hands in position.

You only were hesitant but continued.

A few seconds later, you were starting to feel a bit weak but you couldn’t stop, not when you were so close. You can just feel it.

Extreme pain like you never felt before was now coursing through your body.

Just a few more seconds and everything would be fine.

You pushed the thought of your own pain in the back of your head and thought about Peter.

Just as your body started shaking, it was over.

You opened your eyes, Peter lets go of your wrists, and your arms fell to your side.

Then, you see Peter falling back onto his back.

You look at him and ask, “Pete, are you alright?”

The only answer you got from him was a thumbs up.

You slowly crawled towards him and took off his mask so he can breathe better.

You see his eyes were closed and his breathing was evening out. So, you figured he fell asleep.

You moved piece of his hair that fell on his face to the side, and kissed him on the forehead.

You were exhausted, so you laid down next to him, pulled the blanket over you two, and fell asleep.

*the next day*

Your eyes fluttered open feeling a pair of arms wrapped around you and your back pressed up against a firm chest.

You slightly turn your head to see Peter sleeping.

You smiled and turned away.

You carefully unwrapped his arms from your body and got up. Though, once you got up, you felt so weak.

You have never felt so weak in your entire life.

You thought that maybe since you’re healing someone else, the pain has to go somewhere, so it goes to you so it isn’t as painful as it is to them.

You sat with your back resting on your headboard and rested your eyes for a little longer.

Then, you heard a groan from Peter.

You opened your eyes and looked over at Peter waking up.

“Good morning sleepyhead.” You said.

“Hmm what happened?”

“Well, you had a concussion last night and I healed you.”

“Really? How?”

“Well, there’s something I haven’t told you and that is that I have superpowers. More specifically, healing powers.”

“Really? That’s so cool, why didn’t you tell me?”

“I thought you would think I was a freak.”

He got up and looked into your eyes and said, “I would never think that. Your powers doesn’t make you any less you. What you have is something that’s amazing and spectacular.”

You blushed and said, “Thank you… Spider-Man.”

You see his eyes widen and said, “Wh-what? Spider-Man? Pffst, where did you get that idea?”

“Umm because of that.” You said while pointing down to his suit.

He looks down seeing that he was in his Spider-Man suit and said, “I-I-I can explain this.”

He looks back at you and you gesture for him to continue.

“I… th-this isn’t what it looks like.” He said.

“Mmhmm, sure Pete sure.”

He groaned and said, “Fine, you promise you won’t tell?”

“Cross my heart, and hope to die.”  

“Thank you for healing me.”

“No problem, I’d do anything for you. I love you.”

“I love you too.”

He leaned his face closer to yours indicating that he was going to kiss you.

You met him halfway, the two of you closed your eyes and kissed.

A few seconds later, you two broke apart and you asked, “You promise you won’t tell anyone about my powers?”

He smiled and said, “Cross my heart, and hope to die.”

You got up and opened your window so he can come him.

As he was coming in, you were internally freaking out because you’re a huge fan.

After he was in, you closed the window.

You turn to look at him and said, “So Spider-Man, what brings you here?”

“Huh uhh…” then he looks around, “oh wait this isn’t Ned’s place.”

“Ned as in Ned Leeds?”

“Yeah, he helps me with my wounds.”

“So, Ned knows who you are?”

“Yeah, he’s my best friend, and he accidentally saw me in my suit without the mask.”

“But…” Then you gasped, “Peter?!” You whisper yell.

“Obviously…” Then he looks down, “oh wait I’m still in my suit.”

“We’ll talk about the Spider-Man thing later but are you okay?”

“I don’t think so, I feel dizzy and nauseous.”

You grabbed his hand and led him to your bed.

“You should sit.” You said and he did as he was told.

You grabbed your laptop, sat down next to Peter, and looked up what he could have.

A few minutes later, you find out that Peter could possibly have a concussion.

You closed your laptop, look over at Peter and asked, “Peter, turn your body towards me.”

He did has he was told and crossed his legs.

“I’m not sure if this will hurt because I never done this to another person but I really hope it doesn’t. If it does though, please forgive me.”

You brought your hands up to either side of his head and closed your eyes but before anything could happen, you felt Peter’s hand caressing your cheek.

You open your eyes and Peter said, “You are absolutely stunning, do you have a boyfriend?”

You smiled and said, “Yes I do.”

He removed his hand from your cheek, bowed his head and said, “Oh.”

You giggled and said, “You’re my boyfriend Pete.”

He lifted his head and said, “Really? Damn I’m lucky!”

You giggled again and said, “I’m more the lucky one but right now, I have to concentrate.”

He nodded and whispered to himself, “No, I’m the lucky one.”

You heard him and smiled.

Then, you closed your eyes and concentrated.

A few seconds later, you hear Peter grunting in pain.

You were about to take your hands away and stop but he instantly held your hands in position.

You only were hesitant but continued.

A few seconds later, you were starting to feel a bit weak but you couldn’t stop, not when you were so close. You can just feel it.

Extreme pain like you never felt before was now coursing through your body.

Just a few more seconds and everything would be fine.

You pushed the thought of your own pain in the back of your head and thought about Peter.

Just as your body started shaking, it was over.

You opened your eyes, Peter lets go of your wrists, and your arms fell to your side.

Then, you see Peter falling back onto his back.

You look at him and ask, “Pete, are you alright?”

The only answer you got from him was a thumbs up.

You slowly crawled towards him and took off his mask so he can breathe better.

You see his eyes were closed and his breathing was evening out. So, you figured he fell asleep.

You moved piece of his hair that fell on his face to the side, and kissed him on the forehead.

You were exhausted, so you laid down next to him, pulled the blanket over you two, and fell asleep.

*the next day*

Your eyes fluttered open feeling a pair of arms wrapped around you and your back pressed up against a firm chest.

You slightly turn your head to see Peter sleeping.

You smiled and turned away.

You carefully unwrapped his arms from your body and got up. Though, once you got up, you felt so weak.

You have never felt so weak in your entire life.

You thought that maybe since you’re healing someone else, the pain has to go somewhere, so it goes to you so it isn’t as painful as it is to them.

You sat with your back resting on your headboard and rested your eyes for a little longer.

Then, you heard a groan from Peter.

You opened your eyes and looked over at Peter waking up.

“Good morning sleepyhead.” You said.

“Hmm what happened?”

“Well, you had a concussion last night and I healed you.”

“Really? How?”

“Well, there’s something I haven’t told you and that is that I have superpowers. More specifically, healing powers.”

“Really? That’s so cool, why didn’t you tell me?”

“I thought you would think I was a freak.”

He got up and looked into your eyes and said, “I would never think that. Your powers doesn’t make you any less you. What you have is something that’s amazing and spectacular.”

You blushed and said, “Thank you… Spider-Man.”

You see his eyes widen and said, “Wh-what? Spider-Man? Pffst, where did you get that idea?”

“Umm because of that.” You said while pointing down to his suit.

He looks down seeing that he was in his Spider-Man suit and said, “I-I-I can explain this.”

He looks back at you and you gesture for him to continue.

“I… th-this isn’t what it looks like.” He said.

“Mmhmm, sure Pete sure.”

He groaned and said, “Fine, you promise you won’t tell?”

“Cross my heart, and hope to die.”  

“Thank you for healing me.”

“No problem, I’d do anything for you. I love you.”

“I love you too.”

He leaned his face closer to yours indicating that he was going to kiss you.

You met him halfway, the two of you closed your eyes and kissed.

A few seconds later, you two broke apart and you asked, “You promise you won’t tell anyone about my powers?”

He smiled and said, “Cross my heart, and hope to die.”

title: Smitten
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2QHzdYb

by xikra1648

Peter had been smitten for years, since high school, but he couldn’t bring himself to actually say anything. It was so obvious even he noticed just how deep he’d fallen. Still, you’d dated other guys and that was enough for Peter to step back, keeping his feelings to himself. Between your discovery of your bloodline and constant training to get your natural skills with magic under control, you had enough to worry about. He’d rather remain friends than risk losing you, but that couldn’t last forever.

title: S.H.I.E.L.D. University
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OgChxB

by Basically_vision

It had been one summer since Fury last saw the demons that filled his office some sitting in leather chairs and the others standing, all waiting for him to speak.

“As you know you nightmares should be gone, but it seems that it, not the case,” The Director started off. “The only people who left are all the teachers, who’s lives you ruined, while you destroyed my school. But since I am a generous man, instead of charging you all the millions of dollars in damage and therapy that have occurred during your time, I am going to let you work it off.”

Fury took a moment to look at each of the former students that filled the small room before continuing, “As teachers. You should be able to handle it, after all, you were all nightmare once.”

Fury took a moment to look at each of the former students that filled the small room before continuing, “As teachers. You should be able to handle it, after all, you were all nightmare once.”

body:
What The Fuck Tony? (Spideypool)

Wade encounters Homecoming Spider Man and Iron Man and after hearing Peter’s voice, comes to the conclusion he is a kid much like the other Avengers did in Civil War, and asks “What the fuck Tony? We are bringing kids into this now?”

Or 

Wade gets pissed that Tony is letting Peter play superhero and ends up babying Spidey when they cross each other’s path and maybe eventually stops after Spiderman and him come to some understanding.
